code: import React,{useRef,useEffect}from"react";import{stripHtml}from"./../../../../../../../utils/html/htmlHelper";import{connect}from"react-redux";var TrackTitle=function TrackTitle(props){var container=useRef(null);useEffect(function(){container.current.textContent=props.title?stripHtml(props.title):"";},[container,props.title]);return React.createElement("span",{className:"track-info-title",ref:container});};var mapsStateToProps=function mapsStateToProps(state,ownProps){return{title:state.console.channel[ownProps.name].track.title};};export default connect(mapsStateToProps)(TrackTitle);
